title: Orc Game Character Sound Effects
description: Enlist a barbaric orc warrior onto the battlefield in your next game! Introducing ESM’s fresh new voice sound pack - “Game Character Orc”. This collection features a male game creature on a mission for blood!
longDescription:
Audio Demos

Video Demos

This orc is a savage, likes long walks on the beach, killing and warmongering. Game Character Orc features over 400+ scripted dialogue lines, battle cries, vocalizations, and every vocal audio asset you need to build exciting in-game moments, trailers, and believable NPC (Non-Player Character) dialogue and interactions.

Game Character Orc provides you with a game ready character voice bank that id inspired by the fantasy game inspired blockbuster hit movie “Warcraft”. The Orc voice texture is slightly deep but maintains a crisp dynamic range. Orc has a dry voice and vocal depth giving him warmth but not going over the top which makes it great as is, or safe to further edit, if needed. Orc works well as an antagonist game character, NPC, and Hero. With Orc, his vocals will carry out his masters biddings even if it means his own death.

All of the recordings are delivered in 44.1kHz/16bit .wav file format, giving you the best quality for sound editing, pitch shifting, and fx processing while keeping a top notch level of clarity and precision. Tell your orc what to do - he can move to the front lines, trash talk an opponent, and terrorize the enemy. The Orc library will give you hours of fun and creativity for your next fantasy based trailer, game, film, presentation and so much more. Game Character Orc - Available Now!
technicalDetails:
• 425 fantasy character voice over audio files
  • 224.9 MB of vocal samples
  • All in 44.1kHz/16bit .wav
  • Game Character Voice Over Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for fantasy games, trailers and film
  • 17 battle cries and sayings
  • 6 breathing paces - quick, snorting, tired, slow, growling
  • 16 coughing sounds - choked, explosive, funny, short, muffled, quiet and wheezy
  • 11 crying voice files - growling, short, sad, pitiful, and snorting
  • 152 immersive, scripted dialogue lines - bring me their heads, got it boss, kill them all
  • 35 fight vocals - groan, growl, angry, grunt, quick, painful, roaring & more
  • 26 game character jumps - single, double jump, roar, long, quick
  • 18 laughing voice sounds - big, evil, explosive, muffled, confident, quiet, soft, short

Number of Audio Waves: 425

Number of Audio Cues: 425

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided:

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5
